FontConfig Class Reference

Detailed Description

Allows accessing the configuration for fonts. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

static ThaiTextRenderer::ThaiFontHint* FontConfig::GetThaiFontHints (  const Font &  font  )  [static]
 

Returns the hinting table for bitmap fonts when rendering Thai glyphs. 0 is returned if Thai is not supported.
